MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30AM due to faulty overhead equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.20AM on Saturday 28th November 2020.
